S08n714:332: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatadharmākṣarāṇi bhūtvā viniḥ sṛtya,
S08n714:333: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikadhano vajrajāpavigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
S08n714:336: sarvatathāgatadharmatādini sarvabuddharddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā svavācatvād vajrasattvasamādheḥ sudṛḍhatvāccaikaghanaḥ avācamahābodhisattvakāyaḥ saṃbhūya,
S08n714:343: atha bhagavān sarvatathāgataguhyavāgvajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya,
S08n714:344: sarvatathāgatavāgjñānasamayaṃ aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuvāksiddhisarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvatsarvatathāgatavāgguhyatāprāptyuttamasiddhaye tadvajrajāpaṃ tasmai avācāya mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyāmanuprādāt |
S08n714:346: atha vajravāco bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena vajrajāpena sarvatathāgatān saṃllāpayannidamudānamudānayāmāsa |
S08n714:357: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sarvakarmasamatājñānasuprativedhatvāt vajrasattvasamādheḥ sa eva bhagavan vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatakarmasamayo bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ,
S08n714:360: sa sakalaḥ sarvatathāgatakarmadhāturbhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghanaḥ sarvākāśadhātusamavasaraṇapramāṇastataḥ sarvatathāgatakarmadhātutaḥ karmavajravigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
S08n714:371: atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatāmoghavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadya,
S08n714:372: sarvatathāgatapūjāpravartanādyaprameyāmoghasarvakarmavidhivistarasamayaśeṣāna-vaśeṣasattvadhātusarvakarmasiddhisarvasukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvat sarvatathāgatavajrakarmatājñānābhijñottamasiddhiphalahetostatkarmavajraṃ tasmai sarvatathāgataviśvakarmaṇe mahābodhisattvāya sarvakarmacakravartitve sarvatathāgatavajrābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya,
S08n714:375: atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsatvastadvajraṃ svahṛdi sthāpya,
S08n714:378: ahaṃ mama kare dattaṃ viśve viśvaṃ niyojitam || iti ||
S08n714:380: atha bhagavān duryodhanavīryamahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavakarmādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatarakṣāsamayannāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrarakṣa ||
S08n714:381: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇirdṛḍhakavacāni bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,
S08n714:382: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano mahāvajrakavacavigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
S08n714:396: atha vajramitro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tena vajravarmeṇa sarvatathāgatān kavacayannidamudānamudānayāmāsa |
S08n714:400: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvamārapramārdemahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavakarmādhiṣṭhānavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ sarvatathāgatopāyasamayaṃ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrayakṣa ||
S08n714:401: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharo mahādaṃṣṭrāyudhāni bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,
S08n714:402: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano vajradaṃṣṭrāvigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
S08n714:416: atha vajracaṇḍo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastadvajradaṃṣṭrāyudhaṃ svamukhe pratiṣṭhāpya,
S08n714:421: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatamuṣṭimahābodhisattvasamayasaṃbhavakarmādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyadaṃ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajrabandhasamayannāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrasandhi ||
S08n714:422: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrābandhā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,
S08n714:423: bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭvaikaghano vajrabandhavigrahaḥ prādurbhūya,
S08n714:429: aho hi sudṛḍho bandhaḥ samayo'haṃ dṛḍhātmanāṃ |
S08n714:435: sarvatathāgatamudrābandhasamayamaśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvatathāgatadevatāsānnidhyakalpanāt sarvasiddhisukhasaumanasyānubhavanārthaṃ yāvatsarvatathāgatasarvajñānamudrādhipatyottamasiddhiphalahetostadvajrabandhaṃ tasmai sarvatathāgatamuṣṭaye mahābodhisattvāya tathaiva pāṇibhyāmanuprādāt |
S08n714:437: atha sa vajramuṣṭirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tena vajrabandhena sarvatathāgatān bandhayannidamudānamudānayāmāsa |
S08n714:446: atha khalvakṣobhyastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānāni niṣpādya,
S08n714:447: sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ vajrāpāramitāsamayobhdavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatavajrasamayāṃ nāma sarvatathāgatamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra sattvavajri ||
S08n714:449: tebhyaśca vajraraśmibhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:457: atha bhagavān ratnasaṃbhavastathāgataḥ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ ratnapāramitāsamayasaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ vajraratnasamayāṃ nāma svamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra ratnavajri ||
S08n714:459: tebhyo ratnaraśmibhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:467: atha bhagavān lokeśvararājastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ dharmapāramitāsamayodbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ dharmasamayāṃ nāma svamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra dharma vajri ||
S08n714:469: tebhyaḥ padmaraśmibhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:473: aho hi sarvabuddhānāṃ dharmavajraṃ ahaṃ śuci |
S08n714:474: yatsvabhāvaviśuddhyā vai rāgo'pi hi sunirmalaḥ || iti ||
S08n714:476: atha bhagavānamoghasiddhistathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya sarvatathāgatajñānamudraṇārthaṃ karmapāramitāsaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakarmasamayāṃ nāma svamudrāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra karmavajri ||
S08n714:478: tebhyaśca sarvatathāgatakarmaraśmimabhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:491: atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ punarapi sarvatathāgataratipūjāsamayasaṃbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajralāsye ||
S08n714:493: tebhyo vajramudrāmukhabhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:494: punarapyekaghanā mahādevī vajrasattvasadṛśātmabhāvā vicitravarṇarūpaliṅgeryāpathā sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā sarvatathāgatakulasaṃgrahabhūtā vajrasattvadayitā saṃbhūya,
S08n714:497: aho na sadṛśī me'sti pūjā hyanyā svayaṃbhuvāṃ |
S08n714:500: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgataratnamālābhiṣekasamayodbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadya māṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajramāle |
S08n714:502: tābhyo mahāratnamudrābhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:508: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatasaṃgītisamayasaṃbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajragīte ||
S08n714:510: tābhyaśca sarvatathāgatadharmamudrābhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:516: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatanṛtyapūjāsamayodbhavavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatakulamahādevīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajranṛtye |
S08n714:517: athāsmina viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sarvatathāgatanṛtyapūjāvidhivistarā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāḥ |
S08n714:518: tebhyaśca sarvatathāgatasarvanṛttapūjāvidhivistarebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā bhūtvā,
S08n714:529: atha punarapi bhagavān akṣobhyastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārtha sarvatathāgatapralhādanasamayodbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatagaṇikāṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajradhūpe ||
S08n714:530: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ anekavidhā dhūpapūjāmeghavyūhāḥ sarvavajradhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritāḥ |
S08n714:533: bhagavato vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgārasya koṇe vāmapārśve candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedamudānamudānayati sma |
S08n714:537: atha bhagavān ratnasaṃbhavastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārtha ratnābharaṇapūjāsamayasaṃbhavavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatapratīhārīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrapuṣpe ||
S08n714:538: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvapuṣpapūjāvyūhāḥ sarvākāśadhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāstebhyaśca sarvapuṣpapūjāvyūhebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya,
S08n714:544: atha bhagavān lokeśvararājastathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārtha sarvatathāgatālokapūjāsamayodbhavavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgatadūtīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrāloke |
S08n714:545: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvālokapūjāvyūhāḥ sakaladharmadhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritāḥ |
S08n714:550: aho hyahaṃ mahodārā pūjā dīpamayī śubhā |
S08n714:553: atha bhagavānamoghasiddhistathāgato bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya pūjāpratipūjārthaṃ sarvatathāgatagandhapajāsamayasaṃbhavavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvatathāgataceṭīṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajragandhe ||
S08n714:554: athāsyāṃ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṃ sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvagandhapūjāvyūhāḥ sarvalokadhātuspharaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtāḥ |
S08n714:555: tebhyaśca gandhapūjāvyūhebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥ samāstathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya punarapyekaghano vajragandhadevatākāyaḥ saṃbhūya,
S08n714:558: yattathāgatagandho vai sarvakāye dadāti hi || iti ||
S08n714:565: atha bhagavān vairocanastathāgataḥ punarapi sarvatathāgatasamayāṃ kuśamahāsattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyeyaṃ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāgaṇapatiṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrāṃkuśa ||
S08n714:566: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātra sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥ |
S08n714:573: yanmayā hi samākṛṣṭā bhajante sarvamaṇḍalam || iti ||
S08n714:575: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatasamayapraveśamahāsattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadya maṃ sarvatathāgatamudrāpraveśapratīhāraṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrapāśa ||
S08n714:576: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasamayapraveśamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritaḥ |
S08n714:579: bhagavato vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgārasya ratnadvāramadhye candramaṇḍalāśrito bhūtvā sarvatathāgatāṃ praveśayann,
S08n714:584: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatasamayasphoṭamahāsattvasamayodbhavasattvavajrannāmasamādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ sarvatathāgatasamayabandhannāma sarvatathāgatadūtaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrasphoṭa ||
S08n714:585: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasamayabandhamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtastebhyaśca sarvatathāgatasamayabandhasarvamudrāgaṇebhyaḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatavigrahā viniḥsṛtya,
S08n714:593: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatāveśamahāsattvasamayasaṃbhavasattvavajrannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemaṃ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāceṭaṃ svahṛdayānniścacāra vajrāveśaḥ ||
S08n714:594: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāgaṇā bhūtvā viniścaritaḥ |
S08n714:601: yatsarvapatayo bhūtvā ceṭā api bhavanti hi || iti ||
S08n714:609: atha tena kṣapālavamuhūrtena sarvatathāgatācchaṭikāsaṃjñāsaṃcoditāḥ sarvalokadhātuprasarameghasamudreṣu sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ sabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāḥ samājamāpadya,
S08n714:610: yena bhagavān vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgāro yena ca bhagavān vairocanastenopajagmurupetya oṃ sarvatathāgatapādavandanāṅkaromi ||
S08n714:611: ityenena prakṛtisiddhena mantreṇa rucijaptena sarvatathāgatapādavandanāṃ kṛtvedamudānamudānayāmāsuḥ ||
S08n714:614: athedamuktvā te daśadiksarvalokadhātusannipatitāḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānena bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye sabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāḥ praviṣṭāḥ |
S08n714:615: tebhyaśca sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ svāni svāni bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni viniḥsṛtya bhagavato vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgārasya sarvapārśveṣu maṇḍalībhūtvā samāpadyāvasthitā idamudānamudānayāmāsuḥ |
S08n714:619: atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punarapi samājamāgamyāsya vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalasyādhiṣṭhānāyāśeṣānavaśeṣasya ca sattvadhātoḥ paritrāṇasarvahitasukhāvāptyai yāvatsarvatathāgatasamatājñānābhijñābhisaṃbodhyuttamasiddhaye bhagavantaṃ sarvatathāgatādhipatiṃ svavajrasattvamanādinidhanaṃ mahāvajradharamanena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ ||
S08n714:661: atha bhagavān vajradharaḥ sarvatathāgatādhyeṣaṇavacanamupaśrutya sarvatathāgatasamayasaṃbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānannāma samādhiṃ samāpadye vajradhātunnāma mahāmaṇḍalamudājahāra |
S08n714:690: tato vai samyagāgrīntu mudrāṃ badhvā yathāvidhi |
S08n714:691: vajrācāryaḥ praviṣṭvā tu sphoṭya mudrāṃ samāviśeta ||15 ||
S08n714:704: tato dvāreṣu sarveṣu karma kṛtvāṅku śādibhiḥ |
S08n714:707: sādhayeta mahāsattvo jaḥ hūm vaṃ hoḥ pravartayan ||7 ||
S08n714:718: santi bhagavantastathāgatāḥ kecit sattvā mahāpāpakāriṇaste idaṃ vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭā ca sarvāpāyavigatā bhaviṣyanti |
S08n714:719: santi ca bhagavantaḥ sattvāḥ sarvārthabhojanapānakāmaguṇagṛddhāḥ samayadviṣṭāḥ puraścaraṇādiṣvaśaktāḥ |
S08n714:722: sarvāśāparipūrisaṃpadabhūteṣu niruttararatiprītiharṣasaṃbhavakareṣu sarvatathāgatakulamaṇḍaleṣu śikṣāpadabhayabhītā na praviśanti |
S08n714:724: santi ca punarbhagavanto dhārmikāḥ sattvāḥ sarvatathāgataśīlasamādhiprajñottamasiddhyupāyairbuddhabodhiṃ prārthayanto dhyānavimokṣādibhirbhūmibhiryantaḥ kliśyante |
S08n714:727: tatrādita eva tāvat sarvatathāgatapraṇāmacatuṣṭayaṃ kārayet | tadyathā |
S08n714:730: tathava sthito vajrāñjaliṃ hṛdi kṛtvā lalāṭena praṇamedanena mantreṇa oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiṣekāyātmānanniryātayāmi savatathāgatavajraratnābhiṣiñca mām ||
S08n714:731: tatastathaivotthāya vajrāṃjalibandhena śirasā mukhena praṇamedanena mantreṇa oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjāpravartanāyātmānaṃ niryātayāmi sarvatathāgatavajradharma pravartaya mām ||
S08n714:732: tatastathaiva sthito vajrāṃjaliṃ śiraso'vatārya hṛdi kṛtvā murdhnā praṇamedanena mantreṇa oṃ sarvatathāgatapūjākarmaṇe ātmānanniryātayāmi sarvatathātavajrakarma kuru mām ||
S08n714:733: tato raktavastrottarīyo raktapaṭṭakāvacchāditamukhaḥ sattvavajrimudrāṃ bandhayedanena hṛdayena samayastvam ||
S08n714:734: tato madhyāṅgulidvayena mālāṃ granthyā praveśayedanena hṛdayena samaya hūṃ ||
S08n714:742: tataḥ svayaṃ vajrācāryaḥ sattvavajramudrāmeva mūrdhvāmukhīṃ badhvā vajraśiṣyasya mūrdhni sthāsyaivaṃ vadet |
S08n714:745: tatastayaiva samayamudrayā udakaṃ śapathahṛdayena sakṛt parijñāpya,
S08n714:749: nirbhidya tatkṣaṇaṃ yāyād yadi brūyādimaṃ nayam ||
S08n714:754: mā te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyāṃ kṛtvā narapatanaṃ syād” iti uktvā,
S08n714:778: tatastāṃ mudrāṃ badhvā svahṛdi mokṣayedanena hṛdayena
S08n714:783: hūṃ ha ha ha ha hoḥ ||
S08n714:784: tatastāṃ mālāṃ mahāmaṇḍale kṣepayedanena hṛdayena pratīccha vajra hoḥ ||
S08n714:786: tatastāṃ mālāṃ gṛhya tasyaidha śirasi bandhayedanena hadayena oṃ pratigṛṇhatvamimaṃ satvaṃ mahābalaḥ ||
S08n714:787: tayā bandhayā tena mahāsattvena pratīcchito bhavati,
S08n714:789: tatastathāviṣṭasyaiva mukhabandhaṃ muṃcedanena hṛdayena oṃ vajrasattvaḥ svayante'dya cakṣūddhāṭanatatparaḥ uddhāṭayati sarvākṣo vajracakṣu ranuttaram ||
S08n714:796: kadācit bhagavān mahāvajradharaḥ svarūpeṇa darśanaṃ dadāti,
S08n714:801: tato mahāmaṇḍalaṃ darśayitvā vajrādhiṣṭhitakalaśād gandhodakenābhiṣiṃcedanena hṛdayena vajrābhiṣiñca ||
S08n714:802: tatastvekatamāṃ mudrāṃ mālāṃ vadhvā svacinhaṃ pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpyaivaṃ vadet |
S08n714:805: oṃ vajrādhipati tvāmabhiṣiṃcāmi tiṣṭha vajra samayastvam ||
S08n714:807: oṃ vajrasattva tvāmabhiṣiṃcāmi vajranāmābhiṣekataḥ he vajra nāma ||
S08n714:808: yasya yannāma kuryāttasya he-śabdaḥ prayoktavya iti ||
S08n714:822: vajrabimbaṃ tu jivhāyāṃ bhāvayed buddhimān naraḥ |
S08n714:851: bhāvayan vajranetraṃ tu dadyād vidyādhṛtāṃ padam ||3 ||
S08n714:876: oṃ vajrasattvaḥ svayaṃ te'dya hṛdayaṃ samavasthitaḥ |
S08n714:892: bhagena praviśet kāyaṃ striyāyāḥ puruṣasya vā |
S08n714:893: praviṣṭvā manasā sarvaṃ tasya kāryaṃ samaṃ sphared || iti |
S08n714:901: “na kasyacit tvayānyasyaiṣāṃ mudrāṇāmakovidasya ekatarāpi mudrā darśayitavyā |
S08n714:903: tathā hi te satvā adṛṣṭamahāmaṇḍalāḥ santo mudrābandhaṃ prayojayanti tadā teṣānna tathā siddhirbhaviṣyati |
S08n714:904: tataste vicikitsā prāptā viṣamāparihāreṇa śīghrameva kālaṃ kṛtvāvīcīmahānarake patantaḥ |
S08n714:910: prāpnoti sarvagāmitvaṃ buddhatvamapi na durlabham ||2 || iti ||
S08n714:922: kṛtvā tu sādhayetsarvaṃ tataḥ paścād yathāsukham ||5 || iti ||
S08n714:925: badhvā tu paratastaṃ tu mahāsattvaṃ prabhāvayet ||1 ||
S08n714:926: taṃ dṛṣṭvā jñānasattvaṃ tu svaśarīre prabhāvayet |
S08n714:927: ākṛṣya praveśya badhvā vaśīkṛtvā ca sādhayet ||
S08n714:937: yasya sattvasya yā mudrā tāmātmānantu bhāvayet |
S08n714:939: “jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ” bruvan kāye sarvabuddhān praveśayet |
S08n714:940: manasā sādhuyogena sādhanaṃ tvaparam mahad || iti ||3 ||
S08n714:944: sattvavajra yāntu mudrāyāṃ sarvaratnādhipaḥ sa tu ||5 ||
S08n714:945: siddhastu dharmavajra yā vai buddhadharmadharo bhavet |
S08n714:961: vajrayakṣaṃ tu vai sādhya vajrayakṣasamo bhavet |
S08n714:963: vajralāsyāṃ tu vai sādhya mahāvajraratiṃ labhet |
S08n714:966: vajranṛtyāṃ tu saṃyojya sarvabuddhaiḥ sa pūjyate ||16 ||
S08n714:968: vajrapuṣpāṃ tu saṃyojya vaśīkuryājjagat sa tu ||17 ||
S08n714:985: samayagrāhikā mudrā bandhaṃ siddhiṃ ca karma ca ||5 ||
S08n714:995: sā eva varjakośā tu madhyamā mukhasandhitā ||10 ||
S08n714:999: sā eva tu samāgryā vai hṛdisthā suprasāritā ||12 ||
S08n714:1020: vajraketudharo bhūtvā sarvāśāḥ sa tu pūrayet |
S08n714:1023: vajrakośāṃ tu saṃgṛhya sarvakleśāṃ cchinatti saḥ ||24 ||
S08n714:1030: lāsyayā ratayo divyāḥ mālayā bhūṣaṇāni ca |
S08n714:1031: gītayā sphuṭavāco nityaṃ pūjāṃ labhati nṛtyayā ||28 ||
S08n714:1035: vajrasphoṭā tu bandhayād vajraghaṇṭā samāviśed ||30 || iti ||
S08n714:1041: “aho sukha” iti prokte buddhānapi sa rāgayet |
S08n714:1042: “sādhu sādhv” iti vai proktvā sādhukāraiḥ sa toṣayet ||3 ||
S08n714:1045: “artha-prāptira” iti prokte sarvāśāḥ pūrayet sa tu |
S08n714:1046: “ha ha hūṃ he-” [ti prokte samabuddhahāsaṃ prāpnu] yāt ||5 ||
S08n714:1053: “śatru bhakṣa” iti prokte sarvaśatrun sa bhakṣayet |
S08n714:1060: “hesphoṭa vaṃ” mahābandhā “ghaṇṭā aḥ aḥ” pracālite- || ti ||12 ||
S08n714:1062: jivhāyāṃ bhāvayed vajrāṃ sarvakarmāṇi kurvate || ti ||13 ||
S08n714:1068: akṣobhyasya bhūmisparśā ratne tu varadā tathā |
S08n714:1097: vajratuṣṭyā jināḥ sarve sādhukārān dadanti hi ||17 ||
S08n714:1101: vajrasmitāṃ samādhāya hased buddhaiḥ samaṃ laghu ||19 ||
S08n714:1115: bandhayed vajranigaḍā vajraghaṇṭā tu cālayed || iti ||26 ||
S08n714:1117: tatrādita eva vajrabandhāṅgulīṃ tālaṃ kṛtvā hṛdaye,
S08n714:1127: tatrādita eva svamudrāṃ badhvā svamudrāsatvamātmānaṃ bhāvayedanena hṛdayena samayo'ham ||
S08n714:1128: tataḥ svamudrāsattvamātmānaṃ bhāvya tenādhiṣṭhāyedanena mantreṇa samayasattvādhitiṣṭhasva mām |
S08n714:1132: tatrādita eva arthasiddhimicchatā tena hṛdayena arthasiddhi ||
S08n714:1140: atha sarvamudrāṇāṃ sāmānyaḥ svakāyavākcittavajreṣu vajrīkaraṇavidhivistaro bhavati |
S08n714:1150: sarvakarmasu ca me cittaśreyaḥ kuru hūṃ
S08n714:1151: ha ha ha ha hoḥ bhagavan sarvatathāgatavajra mā me muṃca,
S08n714:1153: “anenānantaryakāriṇo'pi sarvatathāgatamokṣā api saddharmapratikṣepakā api sarvaduṣkṛtakāriṇo'pi sarvatathāgatamudrāsādhakā varjasattvadṛḍhībhāvādihaiva janmanyāsu yathābhirucitāṃ sarvasiddhimuttamasiddhiṃ vajrasiddhiṃ vajrasattvasiddhiṃ vā yāvat tathāgatasiddhiṃ vā prāpsyantī-“tyāha bhagavāṃ sarvatathāgatavajrasattvaḥ || ||
S08n714:1155: tatrādita eva yatoyataḥ samutpannā mudrā tān tatratatraiva muñcedanena hṛdayena vajra muḥ ||
S08n714:1156: tato hṛdayotthitayā ratnavajrimudrayā svābhiṣekasthānasthitayābhiṣicyāgrāṅgulibhyāṃ mālāṃ veṣṭavyaṃ badhvā tathaiva kavacaṃ bandhayedanena hṛdayena oṃ ratnavajrābhiṣiñca sarvamudrā me dṛḍhīkuru varakavacena vam ||
S08n714:1158: samatālayā toṣayedanena hṛdayena vajra tuṣya hoḥ ||
S08n714:1159: anena vidhinā mudrā muktā baddhāśca toṣitā |
S08n714:1167: kalpoktaiḥ svakṛtairvāpi sādhanaṃ tvatra sarvataḥ || iti ||
S08n714:1173: tato'bhyantaramaṇḍale'pyanenaiva vajrastutigītena vajranṛtyakarapuṭena gṛhya dhūpādibhiḥ pūjā kāryā |
S08n714:1176: tataḥ “sarve yathāśaktyā pūjayantvi” ti sarvatathāgatān vijñāpya,
S08n714:1178: yathā praviṣṭāṃ yathā vibhavataḥ sarvarasāhāravihārādibhiḥ sarvopakaraṇarmahāmaṇḍale niryātitaiḥ santuṣyedaṃ sarvatathāgatasiddhivajravrataṃ dadyāt |
S08n714:1182: eṣa tvā dhārayāmi vajrasatva hi hi hi hi hūṃ ||
S08n714:1183: tataḥ ”sarveṣāṃ punarapi na kasyacid vaktavyam” iti śapathahṛdayamākhyeyaṃ |
S08n714:1184: tato yathā praviṣṭān saṃpreṣya sarvatathāgatān vijñāpayet,
S08n714:1187: oṃ kṛto vaḥ sarvasatvārthaḥ siddhirdattā yathānugā |
